alert.note: Alert for Northern Liberty; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 12:16AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Liberty County through 1245 AM CDT... At 1216 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ames, or 8 miles east of Liberty, moving northeast at 40 mph. Weak rotation is being noted in this storm. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ames, Daisetta and Devers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
